attributes.action: Inform & provide free access to credit reports for those people whose details were lost in the data transfer between the HMRC and NAO
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When the HM Revenue & Customs lost the two discs containing information on 25 million individuals that claim child benefit they greatly increased the risk of identity fraud for these people.

The government should inform each and every household that were affected, and offer them free access to their credit report for two years so that they can easily keep an eye on what is happening on their credit file.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
